statements: SELECT id, action, timestamp, user_id, details FROM audit_trails;
SELECT id, action, timestamp, details FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT action, user_id, details FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'LOGIN' AND details LIKE '%successful%';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'LOGOUT' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE action LIKE '%update%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, action, timestamp, details FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, details FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'delete' AND user_id = 2 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, action, timestamp, details FROM audit_trails WHERE action IN ('create', 'update') AND details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM AuditTrail;
SELECT User, Action, Timestamp FROM AuditTrail ORDER BY Timestamp DESC;
SELECT DocumentType, Content FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE UploadDate > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DocumentID, DocumentType, UploadDate FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE DocumentType = 'Policy';
SELECT Action, User, Timestamp FROM AuditTrail ORDER BY User;
SELECT * FROM AuditTrail WHERE User = 'admin';
SELECT Action, User, Timestamp FROM AuditTrail WHERE Action = 'login' ORDER BY Timestamp DESC;
SELECT DocumentType, Content FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE UploadDate > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY DocumentType ASC;
SELECT DocumentType, COUNT(*) AS Total FROM ComplianceDocuments GROUP BY DocumentType HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT Action, COUNT(*) AS TotalActions FROM AuditTrail GROUP BY Action ORDER BY TotalActions DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT id, action, user_id, details FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT document_name, document FROM policy_documents WHERE approved = TRUE;
SELECT report_name, report_details, reviewer_id FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT id, action, user_id, details FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT id, action, details FROM audit_trails WHERE action LIKE '%create%';
SELECT report_name, reviewer_id, created_date FROM compliance_reports WHERE reviewer_id = 3 ORDER BY created_date;
SELECT document_name, created_date FROM policy_documents WHERE approved = TRUE;
SELECT id, action, date_time FROM audit_trails WHERE date_time >= '2021-05-01' AND date_time < '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT document_text FROM policy_documents WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE full_name LIKE 'John Smith%';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT username, full_name FROM users WHERE user_id = 56789 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_text FROM policy_documents WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND creation_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_text LIKE '%security%' AND report_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails JOIN users ON audit_trails.user_id = users.user_id WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails;
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, user_id FROM audit_trails WHERE document_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, title, content FROM policy_documents ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, action, timestamp, user_id, document_id FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT title, content FROM policy_documents WHERE id = 3;
SELECT report_name, reviewer, findings FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT action_name, description FROM audit_actions WHERE created_by = 'Admin';
SELECT username, email, role FROM user_accounts ORDER BY created_at ASC;
